aboutme.headline: Who I am
aboutme.greeting: Hi, Im a german speaking Frontend Developer based in Munich. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.
aboutme.infoOne: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively both on-site in Munich and remotely.
aboutme.infoTwo: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
aboutme.infoThree: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.

leftside.headline: Contact me
leftside.question: Got a problem to solve?
leftside.paragraph: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.

rightside.name: What's your name?
rightside.nameError: Oops! It seems your name is missing
rightside.messageError: What do you need to develop?
rightside.messagePlaceholder: What do you need to develop?
rightside.checkPrivacyThird: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

evaluations.reviewKaloyanIvanov: Christopher greatly enriched the team in our team project with his iron stamina, even in difficult phases, with a clear head and calm approach. With his project experience in the front end, he played a decisive role in the success of the project.  Thank you for the successful cooperation Chris.
evaluations.reviewManuelMannhold: Working with Christopher was very pleasant from the start. He impresses with his professionalism, solution-oriented thinking and reliable way of working. With his open and friendly nature, he contributes significantly to positive team dynamics.

portfolio.porfolioDescription: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
portfolio.join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
portfolio.epl: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
portfolio.dabubble: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

technologies.introductoryText: My journey has involved working on diverse projects, employing a range of frontend technologies and concepts. I am open to embracing new technologies and methodologies to Continously enhance my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.
technologies.invitationContact: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
technologies.specialinteresting: I have a special interest in learning

imprint.source: Created with the free Data Protection Generator.de by Dr. Thomas Schwenke
imprint.socialMedia: Social media and other online presences
imprint.socialMediaParagraph: This legal notice also applies to the following social media presences and online profiles:
imprint.useText: Reserved use for text and data mining
imprint.Disclaimer: Disclaimer: The contents of this online offer were created carefully and according to our current state of knowledge, but are only intended for information purposes and have no legally binding effect, unless they are legally binding information (e.g. the legal notice, the data protection declaration, general terms and conditions or mandatory instructions). of consumers). We reserve the right to change or delete the content in whole or in part, provided contractual obligations remain unaffected. All offers are subject to change and non-binding.
imprint.links: Links to external websites: The contents of external websites to which we refer directly or indirectly are outside our area of ​​responsibility and we do not adopt them as our own. We assume no responsibility for any content or disadvantages that arise from the use of the information accessible on the linked websites.
imprint.copyrights: Copyrights and trademark rights: All content presented on this website, such as texts, photographs, graphics, brands and trademarks, are protected by the respective intellectual property rights (copyrights, trademark rights). The use, reproduction, etc. are subject to our rights or the rights of the respective authors or rights holders.
imprint.violations: Notice of legal violations: If you notice any legal violations on our website, we ask you to point them out to us. We will remove illegal content and links immediately after becoming aware of them.

privacy.intro: The following information provides a simple overview of how your personal data is processed.
privacy.responsible: Who is responsible for data collection?
privacy.dataProcessingResponsibility: The processing of your data is carried out by the responsible party: {{responsibleParty}}.
privacy.howWeCollect: How do we collect your data?
privacy.dataSubmission: Data submission via forms is voluntary and performed with your consent.
privacy.technicalData: Technical data is collected automatically when you visit our website.
privacy.usage: How do we use your data?
privacy.dataUsage: We use your data to improve user experience and provide better services.
privacy.rights: What rights do you have regarding your data?
privacy.rightsDescription: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data at any time.
privacy.rightsContact: For more information, please contact us at {{email}}.
privacy.analysisTools: We use third-party tools to analyze website traffic.
privacy.analysisToolsDetails: These tools include Google Analytics and other similar services.
privacy.hostingInfo: We use external hosting services to store and manage our website data.
privacy.stratoInfo: We use Strato AG for hosting our website. Strato is located in Germany.
privacy.stratoLink: You can view Strato's privacy policy here.
privacy.stratoLegalBasis: The legal basis for this data processing is the contract with Strato AG.
privacy.contractProcessingInfo: Strato processes your data on our behalf as part of the hosting agreement.
privacy.dataProtectionInfo: We take the protection of your personal data seriously and use technical measures to safeguard it.
privacy.responsiblePerson: The responsible person for data protection is {{responsiblePerson}}.
privacy.contactInfo: Contact Information: You can reach us via email or phone.
privacy.storageDurationInfo: We store your data only for as long as necessary for the purposes of processing.
privacy.legalBasesInfo: We process your data based on your consent, contract execution, and legal obligations.
privacy.dataRecipientsInfo: Your data may be shared with third parties, such as service providers.
privacy.withdrawalConsentInfo: You can withdraw your consent to data processing at any time.
privacy.rightToObjectInfo: You have the right to object to data processing based on legitimate interests.
privacy.complaintRightInfo: If you believe that your data processing violates the law, you can lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority.
privacy.dataPortabilityInfo: You have the right to receive your data in a structured, commonly used format.
privacy.accessCorrectionDeletion: Right to Access, Correct, or Delete Your Data
privacy.accessCorrectionDeletionInfo: You can request to access, correct, or delete your personal data.
privacy.restrictionOfProcessingInfo: You can request the restriction of processing under certain conditions.
privacy.restrictionCondition1: The accuracy of the data is contested by the data subject.
privacy.restrictionCondition2: The processing is unlawful and the data subject opposes deletion.
privacy.restrictionCondition3: The data controller no longer needs the personal data for processing.
privacy.restrictionCondition4: The data subject has objected to processing pending verification.
privacy.sslInfo: We use SSL encryption to protect your data during transmission.
privacy.advertisementEmailsInfo: We do not send unsolicited advertisement emails.
privacy.contactFormInfo: You can contact us through our contact form. We process the data you provide there for communication purposes.
privacy.contactFormProcessing: We process the data submitted through the contact form based on your consent.
